1.title: Snow Storm

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: While exploring uncharted areas of snow filled terrain, Romeo must utilize his survival skills to find a way back to civilization. Grief-stricken and powered by reprisal, the legend finds accord in an alternate location.

2.title: Scavenger

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: No Stairs

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Romeo stumbles into a violent subculture that makes his previous vaults look like small potatoes. Dah callously removes his precious stairs and coerces Romeo to take the jump of his life.

1.title: Romeo Takes a Nap (Pilot)

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: This breathtaking first episode finds Romeo taking a nap. While asleep he contemplates the minutiae of his day to day life while metaphysically delineating the cognitive and emotional tasks of his daily operations. Much like Sam Mendes' "Jarhead" this first episode is incredibly realistic.

2.title: I'm Free

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: In this emotionally charged 2nd episode Romeo has just come in from the cold. The social constraints and internment have finally been lifted. Romeo triumphantly rejoices while rejecting the societal pressure to fit in and be someone your not.

3.title: Do You Want to Go for a Walk

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Romeo is presented with the option to go outside but suffers from a bit of uncertainty. He ponders the proposal profusely while gracefully admitting to Dah that he feels lost with his current situation.

4.title: New Toy

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Dah presents Romeo with a gift that he quickly renounces. Romeo subtly hints that he still feels misplaced in his present situation, which is not helped by the cultural barriers he feels in his new town, those cultural barriers extending far beyond not just the walls of his apartment but the walls of something much bigger...

5.title: Gimme Your Sock

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: A Dangerous game unfolds in this episode that critics are boasting is just as realistic as Sofia Coppola's: Lost in Translation.

6.title: Sweet Freedom

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Romeo has escaped. He goes on a exultant rampage against authority and other civil restrictions. This gripping yet controversial 6th episode will have you wanting more and questioning all you know about society.

7.title: Second Nap

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Episode 1.7 - "Second Nap" - Romeo's passion for naps is evident as this episode unfolds with brilliant cinematic prowess. He has some difficulty remaining faithful to his passion as a small disturbance interferes. Romeo's maturity and age allow him to act on his feelings in a clever and original manner.

8.title: Sock Thief

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: In this riveting episode we see first hand what the Yorkshire Terrier is really capable of. Romeo is caught playing with a another sock, a different sock, a more expensive sock!! Dah Glovah catches Romeo in the act and tries to get it back...at one point exclaiming it is his sock, when in actuality the sock really belongs to Danni Sunshine. Nothing is as it seems in this gripping episode.

9.title: The Chase

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Dah finds his predicament difficult to escape.

10.title: Eating

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Romeo has a very mercurial way about him when consuming dinner.

11.title: Use Your Stairs

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Romeo uses his stairs to get on the bed in this breathtaking episode. Many top critics agree if you thought "Manchester By the Sea" got the trivial day to day details right, you have not seen anything.

12.title: Water for My Dog

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: "Water for my Dog" - Is an awe-inspiring look at the fickle way Romeo hydrates himself. Brace yourself for a healthy dose of humor and humanity in this evaporative 12th episode.

13.title: Mad Skills

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: Episode 1.13 - "Mad Skills" Is a tour-de-force of toughness and endurance. Dah tries to run away with a treat. Romeo not only displays his speed and agility but a bold affirmation and a dogged persistence. The entire episode is one of symphonic ambitions and fierce uncompromising performances.

14.title: Winter Walk

episode of.title: ROMEO: A Dog Day in the Life (TV Series 2016– )

14.plot: "Winter Walk" Is a spellbinding episode filled with passionate performances and waves of emotional nuance. Romeo begins a revolt following Dah's merciless mandate while continuing his long quest for freedom. This unprecedented season finale gives life to a historical hero that will live on in your mind forever while synchronously shedding lights on a new season to come. Brace yourself for a heart stopping saga which audiences around the world have unquestionably declared the greatest web-series of all time.
